lead_paragraph: The administration of Graham B. Spanier, the former president of Penn State, was marked by broad successes but also jealous protection of the university’s reputation.
snippet: The administration of Graham B. Spanier, the former president of Penn State, was marked by broad successes but also jealous protection of the university’s reputation.
